experience.title: Co-Founder
experience.description: PhotographAI is a one-stop technology platform for ready-to-use machine learning solutions for your business use. Be it an image classification task, text analytics solution, or video analytics technology, PhotographAI is the answer. Our ready-to-use APIs help our customers to focus on their business need rather than worrying about development, deployment, and maintenance of these machine learning solutions. â€¢	Intelligent OCR to extract client information from an ID cardâ€¢	Extracting human filled information from a handheld image of a form and digitizing itâ€¢	Image classification models for across various ID cards, apparels and genresâ€¢	Face detection and recognition with a single facial image of a userâ€¢	Text classification over various genres using Fast-AIâ€¢	Super-fast inference server capable of handling over 500 images per second on a single GPU
